title: Why the fuck was Executioner removed?
body:
Really enjoy losing games because the enemy has Soraka + Nidalee + Ekko, our only AP doesn't feel like building Morello, and there's nothing I can do to stop Soraka + Nidalee from healing someone from 20% to 100% in the middle of a team fight.

Instead, I have to rely on my AP carry not being retarded. Which you haven't been able to do since season 3.

Good job, Riot.
